scripts.load:medium: docker run --rm --network coffee-shop-simulator_coffee-shop-network -v ../scripts:/scripts -e REQUESTS=200 -e SLEEP_SEC=0.05 curlimages/curl:latest sh /scripts/load.sh
scripts.load:duration: docker run --rm --network coffee-shop-simulator_coffee-shop-network -v ../scripts:/scripts -e DURATION=30 -e SLEEP_SEC=0.1 curlimages/curl:latest sh /scripts/load.sh
scripts.load:stress: docker run --rm --network coffee-shop-simulator_coffee-shop-network -v ../scripts:/scripts -e REQUESTS=500 -e SLEEP_SEC=0.01 curlimages/curl:latest sh /scripts/load.sh
